title: Vanquish
description: Her life is like a prison cell.A self-made, to-hell-with-the-free-world existence that locks from the inside.Stop judging. Her agoraphobia doesn’t define her. It simply keeps her safe.He belongs in a prison cell.The 6x8, make-me-your-bitch variety that locks from the outside.But he’s free. To hunt. To take. To break.And he just found a sexy new toy.Capturing her is the easy part. Her fucked-up mind, however, makes him question everything he does next.But he’s a determined bastard. If all goes his way, this will hurt like hell.DELIVER series (HEAs with no cliffhangers - must be read in order):Deliver #1Vanquish #2Disclaim #3Devastate #4Take #5Manipulate #6Unshackle #7Dominate #8Complicate #9
author: Pam Godwin
